item.title: Cell Phone Family Plans for Professionals
item.description:
Typically, “family plans” bring to mind adding lines for children. However, in the current economic climate, a family plan could be the difference between two working individuals each having a dedicated phone and being forced to share. Sharing a phone is impractical for business, so let’s explore these family plans further. You might not have considered this option for professional use due to the name “family plan.” These plans are more accurately described as shared minutes plans, but the name “family plan” has stuck, so we’ll use it here...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/cell-phone-family-plans-for-professionals/

item.title: QT Talk is Both VoIP and Dial-Around
item.description:
Many people are interested in VoIP phone service because of its features and affordability, but they also want the freedom of mobile calling. QT Talk offers a solution that combines the advantages of VoIP with the flexibility of cellular service. QT Talk provides a feature-rich VoIP service, including their popular North America Plus plan. For a low monthly fee, users enjoy unlimited calls to the U.S., Canada, and Puerto Rico, along with a reduced rate to select international destinations...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/qt-talk-is-both-voip-and-dial-around/
